mapper.select: SELECT id, address, tag_info tagInfo, note, create_time timeString FROM link_info ORDER BY create_time desc

SELECT ii.issue_id, ii.type, ii.content, oi.option_id, oi.content AS optionContent FROM questionnaire_info AS qi LEFT JOIN questionnaire_issue AS qis ON qi.questionnaire_id = qis.questionnaire_id LEFT JOIN issue_info AS ii ON qis.issue_id = ii.issue_id LEFT JOIN issue_option AS io ON ii.issue_id = io.issue_id LEFT JOIN option_info AS oi ON io.option_id = oi.option_id WHERE qi.questionnaire_id =#{Integer} ORDER BY qis.sort, io.sort
SELECT id AS number, user_name AS userName FROM staff_info WHERE id = #{Integer}

SELECT si.id sId, si.user_name sName, si.dep_name depName, mi.post_name mpostName, mi.manage_coverage mCoverage, si.confirm_date scDate FROM staff_info AS si, manager_info AS mi
WHERE si.id IN ( SELECT mi.user_id FROM manager_info AS mi WHERE mi.manage_coverage = ( SELECT si.dep_name FROM staff_info AS si, staff_project_info AS spi WHERE si.id = spi.user_id AND si.id = #{Integer} ) OR mi.manage_coverage IN ( SELECT spi.project_name FROM staff_info AS si, staff_project_info AS spi WHERE si.id = spi.user_id AND si.id = #{Integer} ) OR mi.manage_coverage = '开发交付中心' )AND si.id=mi.user_id GROUP BY user_id
SELECT user_name userName, pass_word passWord FROM user_info WHERE user_name = #{string}

SELECT q2.questionnaire_id,q2.issue_id,i1.content,i1.type FROM questionnaire_info q1 LEFT JOIN questionnaire_issue q2 on q1.questionnaire_id = q2.questionnaire_id LEFT JOIN issue_info i1 on q2.issue_id = i1.issue_id WHERE q1.questionnaire_id = 1 ORDER BY q2.questionnaire_id,q2.sort
SELECT i1.issue_id,i1.sort,o1.content FROM issue_option i1 LEFT JOIN option_info o1 ON i1.option_id = o1.option_id ORDER BY i1.issue_id,i1.sort
